name: Art Of Valor
text: Super awesome track and venue!

name: Robert Cowens
text: Just passing by. Has been closed for some time now. Overgrown.

name: James Stout
text: The free state of Winston does it right

name: Dustin Barnette
text: Took the family for one of the races. Was cold and wet outside but had a blast and stayed dry!

name: SimbaJKU
text: Great shop for all your automotive needs. Jon and his staff of assassin's know how to turn your mail crawler into a fully capable monster

name: Joshua Williams
text: Best in the business!!  Great customer service and even better prices!!  Highly recommend and everyone should also check out the website!!!!

name: tim Martz
text: Called 6 times over 3 weeks to have front and rear gears installed in truck.. Talked to same lady every time.  Keeps "forgetting" to call me back with prices.. Really thinking now they cant handle it.

name: swingingforfences swingingforfences
text: Excellent place for parts and service

name: Steven Hoff (Gigabyte)
text: Did a great job balancing my wheels for me. Great service and knowledge there.

name: Danny Brittian
text: I have reached out to this place numerous Times to get work done and they always tell me they are too busy and suggest somewhere else to do business. They were very rude and act as though they do not want to support the community in which they should want to serve.

resp.text: What were you wanting to get done?  I know currently we are booking about two weeks out on service work.

name: Scotty Lovelady
text: Jon and his team are top notch!

name: Chase Stephens
text: Great people, Great variety, Great Patience. Chris, Jeff, and Jon all shared their wealth of knowledge and insight. Top notch guys that do top notch work! Projects big or small this is the place to go. I’ve taken both my truck and Jeep for different things, extremely pleased with everything I’ve had done. If they don’t have what you want in stock, they will work to get it. Check out some of their builds.... they speak for themselves.

name: Clifton Bailey
text: They didn't act like they wanted my business.

resp.text: Im the owner of Rpmextreme. Was there something you needed? I never want any customers to feel like we didn't want their business. As a small business owner its important to me to be sure all my customers feel like they received a higher quality experience.

name: Curt Dusterhoff
text: Tried for over a month to get an estimate on an ls swap in my lj.  Never could get an estimate.  Didnt seem like they wanted my business so I just gave up.

name: Tim Brewis
text: RPM installed my goose neck hitch.  Did a great job at a competitive price.  Turnaround was quick.  I would use them again.

name: Shelby Renner
text: I drive all the way there from southern Illinois for a motor swap in my jeep, a 5.3. It only took about a week for them to get the job done, while they had many other projects going. My jeep runs perfect and is badass now thanks to RPM extreme!!!

name: Robert Wrinkle
text: Good food always and nice people who work thr and ry

name: Mount Zion Offroad
text: These guys are great!  They helped me with a HEMI JK Computer problem.  They were quick, friendly and willing to help!

name: Jason Jones
text: Jon tuned my 2013 JK on his trip to California. Thanks for taking the time out of your busy schedule!  It was easy and he was fast. Fixed my 3-4 shift and gave me more gains than I can list.  Loaded my Flash Paq 87 tune and it drives better than new!  Can't wait to try the other tunes. Thanks again! Highly recommend if you are having the same problem  with your JK when driving uphill.

resp.text: We love helping where we can.

name: Darrell Heimann
text: Have the upmost respect for the very professional staff at this business. Very knowledgeable about Jeep's and are willing to listen to and address your requirements.

name: S Hurley (Grayhemi16)
text: Not just for jeeps. Had them install some relocation brackets on my lowered ram 1500, did great work and at a very good price.

resp.text: Yes its true we do more than just Jeeps. We have a lot of experienced techs in the back and they love a challenge.

name: Robert Thompson
text: Very knowledgeable

name: Stephen Gautreau
text: Great facility. Met Warren, the owner operator. Gave me the grand tour, made me feel comfortable right away. Laid back facility. Decent turnout for a warm and muggy saturday. Looking forward to returning soon.

name: John Van Patten
text: Great practice day. Jesse trying out his new ride. This is NOT a wreck. I repeat... This is NOT a wreck!

name: Robin Westefeld
text: The kids and hubby had a great time. I'd love to see the kids track a little better groomed, but it wasn't bad.

name: James Stamm
text: Pretty awesome, good for beginners or experienced. A little muddy this time but that's just because the rain here has been relentless. Owners nice and seems very knowledgeable.  Me and my buddy had a blast.

name: Kenneth Owens
text: With MX tracks drying up, just happy to have a track close by. Great soil, good berms. Safe jumps.

name: The Rick and James show
text: Great place kid loves riding here

name: Pat Patterson
text: This track is great when prepped and watered properly.

name: Brian G.
text: New design is great

name: Brian Carter
text:
Can't say enough good things about Keith and family and crew.
If you moto, and haven't been on the Mountain, then you don't know what you're missing.
Ride Monster.
Bring friends.

resp.text: Thank you Brian.  We really appreciate the kind words and always love it when your crew rolls in.  FYI.  Brian is an awesome wrench

name: Al Herra
text: Don't pass up a day to ride this track. Great new owner and track crew. We pulled in after a deluge and track was ready to rip next morning. My buddy showed me photos of water rolling across the track and in less then 24 hours they had it prepped nice and deep. Great for practice and conditioning!

resp.text: Thank you so much.  Our team takes pride in the track prep.  I love it when we can turn a muddy track into a primo ride day.  Hope to see y'all again soon

name: BEN BATEMAN
text: Not only an AMAZING track, but ran by a great crew as well!

resp.text: Thank you Ben.  Love having you out here.   Hope to see you soon

name: Lauren McDaniel
text: It was our first time here, and we can’t wait to come back! The SECCA monster mountain buddy race was awesome! The race was very organized and we plan to participate in many more events in the future!

resp.text: Thank you so much.  We had a blast.  Can't wait til the next one.

name: #95Davis Gage Davis
text: Beautiful track friendly staff. Just a great track all around.

resp.text: Thank you so much.  Hope to see you out here soon

name: Shannon Blocker
text: Track was great and had a very good practice. Great people running it

resp.text: Thank you for your review Shannon.  We appreciate your kind words.   We love what we are doing.  Mostly because of the people we meet and have the opportunity to deliver a world-class track.

name: Carrie Lloyd
text: Beautiful place, friendly people. Ride monster and bring friends

resp.text: Thank you.  Thank you for your review and for bringing Friends

name: Cindy Teal
text: The best track in Alabama  and the South East! Excellent staff..great training academy..they go above and beyond to keep it a fun place to ride and race!

name: John Van Patten
text: We have always loved the monster since the day it opened. Tons of good times there. Jesse doing his thing!

name: Robin Westefeld
text: The family had fun and the facilities were clean, however $15 for the kids to ride a track in need of some TLC was a little steep... nevermind that they charged for my 3 year old on his stacyc which kinda made me shake my head.  In the long run though, they had fun and made memories which is the important part.

name: Steven Hunt
text: Nice facilities,  great track.

resp.text: Thank you Steven

name: Michael Daley
text: Monster .mountain motocross park is one of the premier race tracks in the South. Great elevation changes, wide and fast. This track has everything covered from beginner to professional riders. In addition,  there are a couple more tracks on the property to suit all riders interests. A great sunny day and temperatures in the 50's!

resp.text: Thank you for your review!  We really appreciate you taking the time to review our facility.  Hope to see you again soon.  Ride Monster and bring your friends.

name: DAB Motorsports Drake Bates 427
text: Great track! Prepped everyday! Great people that own the track! Super friendly

resp.text: Thank you so much!  We love our riders and their families.

name: Mark Shields
text: One of the best tracks I've ridden, Great facility and friendly people

resp.text:
(Translated by Google) BRAAPP !!!!

(Original)
BRAAPP!!!!

name: Dewy Wiggins
text: Great park many miles of trails 4 different tracks good food great environment

resp.text: Sweet!  Thanks so much

name: Chris Golden
text: Staff was great

resp.text: Thank you for your review and kind words, Chris.  What could we have done better to earn 5 stars from you?  We take rider feedback seriously because we want to be the best mx destination we can possibly be.

name: Scott Rapp
text: Another amazing weekend at the track, changes are good

name: Eric Gossger
text: Always a Great place with Great conditions. Tom & the staff have always been very friendly & helpful. I/we drive from Chicago to ride here. Perfectly prepared track every time. Toilets & showers while camping are a bonus.

name: Gina Mac
text: Just practice or a race, the staff cares about their customers.  The addition of the D9 has improved the track surface over the years, and roads in/out of the park.  Concessions are good.  Bathrooms are CLEAN ♡  Jumps are good and challenging.  We pass 2 other tracks to come here.  Good job!

name: Renay Clark
text: My son races here Garrett Reece. The track was fun the staff was great .I do think they should think bout a concession stand for food and drinks.

resp.text: And we agree 100%.  Thank you for the feedback.  We will be adding concessions for races days as well as big open practices.  The Seared Beard offers some amazing BBQ

name: NAVDRE 1635
text: Very well laid out track. Great for beginners Or advanced riders. Would definitely recommend to any skill level rider.

name: Jimmy Sharpe
text: Nice and hot good racing!

name: Kyle E
text: Track was a lot of fun and well prepped. Track staff was friendly and helpful. I drove 8 hours from Florida to ride here and would do it again.

name: Steve Doss
text: Excellent facility Susan and Tyler are A+

resp.text: Thank you Steve.  We're working hard to make Monster Mountain a very special MX destination

name: Mike Purinton
text: Great track layout. No shade for parking so bring an EZ up or something. They also have a couple shower stalls and water spigots.

resp.text: Thanks Mike.  Come see us again soon

name: Deanalyn Reing
text: You couldn't help all the rain, nice track

resp.text: Thank you.  Please let us know what we can do next time to make the track even better

name: Jamison Reynolds
text: Best place to ride/race in the state!

resp.text: Best in the galaxy is our goal.  🔥🔥🔥🔥

name: Felicia Cox
text: Favorite track!

name: Michael Conner
text: awsome track, really fun layout and good dirt to make nice lines, wish i lived closer

name: Mike Fisher Leadership
text: Always a great experience.

name: a V
text: Awesome track as always. Worth the drive!

name: Landon Cassady
text: The track was awesome like always, but I didn't like that I got second.

name: Mark
text: One of the best tracks in the southeast. There is also a really challenging GP track where the SEVMX groups meet and compete. Quads and side by sides also race on the big track. My favorite track in the southeast.

name: Kylee Bettencourt
text: I got amazing photos of their awesome track and the staff is great

name: Vince Aiken
text: Had  clean bathrooms and good showers in there to cool off and good BBQ plates cheap prices

name: Elliott Miller
text: Awesome track, looking forward to coming back. "Texas Cowboy Texas" - It's not for everyone, you'd probably like it a lot more if you got off of your CRF130 and took a real bike out there.

name: Dave Stanker
text: Awesome place to ride couldn't ask for a nicer people

name: Texas Cowboy Texas
text: This place sucks I have been to tracks all over the U.S. and the best tracks are in Texas,  Alabama people don't know MX

name: Greg Green
text: Looked like a cool place but I can't say for sure because when I tried to take my 2 yr old and wife (because he loves dirt bikes and atv's), just to show him and let him watch for 45 min. I was told that I had to purchase a whole weekend pass ($35) for both me and my wife. My 2 y/o was free but $70.00 just to watch some dirtbikes for an hr is a little much.  She did say if I wore the same paper arm band all weekend then she would refund $20.00 if I brought it back on the second day? Which is Easter and I will not be back this way. I explained to her that we were just going to look for a few minutes and leave. I asked Can I pay $30.00 for one day for the both of us, $15 each just for today? Nope, lol? Couldn't do it. Then they can't take a card at all. So now it this wild arm band deal in cash only and the 2 y/o is passed out in his car seat with my wife on the phone because I'm still negotiating this 45 min dirt bike watching event. Lol so we left.

name: mxracer52 honeybear
text: Awesome crew and awesome track

resp.text: Thank you Honey Bear

name: Chris Lane
text: First class facilitie,power washers,challenging but safe tracks

name: Richard Jennings
text: Great track well worth the drive from Atlanta

name: Alabama DS
text: Nice track,great owner.

name: David Frank
text: Great track one of the best places to ride!!!

name: Stephen Dover
text: Very friendly track. Made for every rider and bike size.

name: Erik Greve
text: Ridden all over, IL, FL, VA, PA, AL, IN, SC, NC, AL, MS, GA, And this track ranks among the funniest and best.  There's a reason it is often chosen for LL Qualifier.  Go, have a blast.

name: Jamie E
text: Best mx track in the Southeast

name: Susan Rife
text: it was fin and the track was nice

name: Kristal Tyler
text: Love it so much fun

name: John burger
text: Great day at the MTN

name: robb norris
text: awesome track.. mx sports, we need a national here!!!!

name: Nana Cheryl Bryant
text: Love this track......

name: MARK PROCTOR
text: Incredible Motocross track

name: Christina Majors
text: Love love love this track

name: joe #212
text: Grate place to ride

name: Big D's Shade Tree
text: Great track!

name: Charity Allen
text: Beautiful track

name: John Beeland
text: Awesome track

name: Timothy Slezsak
text: Amazing place to ride

name: Michael Driscoll
text: It is Motocross Heaven!!!

name: Jason Stewart
text: Great track!

name: Michael Surkand
text: Best place in AL to ride.
